scripts.scriptdata: surfer ALL = NOPASSWD: /AntiVir/scancl surfer ALL = NOPASSWD: /AntiVir/avupdate surfer ALL = NOPASSWD: /AntiVirUpdate/avupdate surfer ALL = NOPASSWD: /usr/bin/chvt

#!/bin/bash
#lesslinux provides scancl-blob #lesslinux license BSD
PATH=/bin:/sbin:/usr/bin:/usr/sbin:/static/bin:/static/sbin export PATH
. /etc/rc.defaults . /etc/rc.subr/extractbootparams . /etc/rc.subr/colors
# Change this to force or skip updates for a certain time keydate='197001010300'
case $1 in start) if mountpoint -q /AntiVir ; then printf "$bold===> Skipping Avira, already mounted $normal\n" else printf "$bold===> Preparing Avira $normal\n" mkdir -m 0755 -p /AntiVir mkdir -m 0755 -p /AntiVirUpdate mkdir -m 0755 -p /var/log/AntiVir mkdir -m 0755 -p /var/log/scancl-blob ln -sf /dev/null /var/log/scancl-blob/scancl.log mkdir -m 0755 -p /media mkdir -m 0755 -p /lesslinux/scancl-blob mkdir -m 0700 -p /tmp/.empty # dummy directory for scan of boot sectors mount -o mode=755 -t tmpfs tmpfs /AntiVirUpdate mount -o mode=755 -t tmpfs tmpfs /AntiVir
forcecd=false if cat /proc/cmdline | grep ' scancl=' | grep -q '|forcecd|' ; then forcecd=true fi
# First try: # Find Avira directories in BLOB partition if [ "$forcecd" = false ] && mountpoint -q /lesslinux/blobpart ; then if [ -d /lesslinux/blobpart/scancl ] ; then echo "Antibot directory already exists, skipping..." else mkdir -p /lesslinux/blobpart/scancl/Protokolle tar -C /lesslinux/cdrom/scancl -cf - antivir avupdate | tar -C /lesslinux/blobpart/scancl -xf - cp /etc/avira/avupdate.bat /lesslinux/blobpart/scancl fi mount --bind /lesslinux/blobpart /lesslinux/scancl-blob fi
# Second try: # Find Avira directories on first partition of the boot drive - this should be VFAT
if mountpoint -q /lesslinux/scancl-blob ; then echo "Antibot directory already mounted, skipping..." elif [ "$forcecd" = false ] && cat /proc/mounts | grep '/lesslinux/cdrom' | awk '{print $1}' | grep -q '[1-9]$' ; then sysdev=` cat /proc/mounts | grep '/lesslinux/cdrom' | awk '{print $1}' | grep -q '[1-9]$' ` rawdev=` echo -n $sysdev | sed 's/[1-9]$//g' ` fstype=` blkid.static -o udev ${rawdev}1 | grep FS_TYPE | grep fat ` if [ -n "$fstype" ] ; then mount -t vfat -o rw,iocharset=utf8 ${rawdev}1 /lesslinux/scancl-blob fi [ -d /lesslinux/scancl-blob/scancl ] || umount /lesslinux/scancl-blob > /dev/null 2>&1 fi
# Third try: # Find Avira directories on any first partition or any superfloppy that is FAT or NTFS # We might later further narrow this down to only USB or removable drives
if mountpoint -q /lesslinux/scancl-blob ; then echo "Antibot directory already mounted, skipping..." elif [ "$forcecd" = false ] ; then devices=` cat /proc/partitions | awk '{print $4}' | grep -v '^name$' | grep '[a-z]$' ` for dev in $devices ; do device=/dev/${dev}1 fstype=` blkid.static -o udev ${device} | grep FS_TYPE | awk -F '=' '{print $2}' ` if [ -z "$fstype" ] ; then device=/dev/${dev} fstype=` blkid.static -o udev ${device} | grep FS_TYPE | awk -F '=' '{print $2}' ` fi case $fstype in [Ee][Xx][Ff][Aa][Tt]*) echo "Ingnoring EXFAT for now" ;; *[Ff][Aa][Tt]*) mountpoint -q /lesslinux/scancl-blob || mount -t vfat -o rw,iocharset=utf8 ${device} /lesslinux/scancl-blob ;; [Nn][Tt][Ff][Ss]*) mountpoint -q /lesslinux/scancl-blob || mount -t ntfs-3g -o rw ${device} /lesslinux/scancl-blob ;; esac [ -d /lesslinux/scancl-blob/scancl ] || umount /lesslinux/scancl-blob > /dev/null 2>&1 done fi
upddir='' avdir='' pdfdir='' disclaimer='' if [ -d /lesslinux/scancl-blob/scancl/antivir -a -d /lesslinux/scancl-blob/scancl/avupdate ] ; then updir='/lesslinux/scancl-blob/scancl/avupdate' avdir='/lesslinux/scancl-blob/scancl/antivir' method='bind' else for d in cdrom isoloop toram ; do if [ -d /lesslinux/$d/scancl/antivir -a -d /lesslinux/$d/scancl/avupdate ] ; then updir=/lesslinux/$d/scancl/avupdate avdir=/lesslinux/$d/scancl/antivir method='copy' [ "$d" = toram ] && method='bind' fi done fi if [ -z "$avdir" ] ; then printf "$bold***> ERROR: No folders avupdate/antivir found, you might $normal\n" printf "$bold force copying by specifying toramdirs=|dir1|dir2|...| $normal\n" printf "$bold to the boot command line. $normal\n" exit 1 fi
if [ "$method" = "bind" ] ; then umount /AntiVir mount --bind "$avdir" /AntiVir chmod -R 0755 /AntiVir elif [ "$method" = "copy" ] ; then tar -C "$avdir" -cvf - . | tar -C /AntiVir -xf - chmod -R 0755 /AntiVir [ "$avdir" = /lesslinux/toram/scancl/antivir ] && rm -rf "$avdir" fi
for i in avupdate avupdate.bin avupdate_msg.avr ; do install -m 0755 "$updir/unix/$i" /AntiVirUpdate done
if [ -f /lesslinux/scancl-blob/scancl/swap.sys ] ; then mkswap /lesslinux/scancl-blob/scancl/swap.sys > /dev/null 2>&1 swapon /lesslinux/scancl-blob/scancl/swap.sys fi
install -m 0644 /etc/avira/avupdate.conf.lesslinux /AntiVirUpdate/avupdate.conf install -m 0644 /etc/avira/scancl.conf.lesslinux /AntiVir/scancl.conf
if [ -f /AntiVir/install/vdf_fusebundle.zip ] ; then [ /AntiVir/install/vdf_fusebundle.zip -nt /AntiVir/vbase000.vdf ] && ( cd /AntiVir ; unzip install/vdf_fusebundle.zip ) fi
if [ -f /AntiVir/hbedv.key ] ; then echo "skipping key file" else install -m 0644 /etc/avira/hbedv.key /AntiVir touch -t "$keydate" /AntiVir/hbedv.key fi install -m 0755 /usr/share/lesslinux/scancl-blob/avupdate /AntiVirUpdate mkdir /tmp/quarantine fi ;; stop) printf "$bold===> Unmounting Avira $normal\n" for f in ` cat /proc/swaps | awk '{print $1}' | grep scancl/swap.sys ` ; do swapoff "$f" done if cat /proc/mounts | grep -q /AntiVir ; then umount /AntiVir umount /AntiVirUpdate fi mountpoint -q /lesslinux/scancl-blob && umount /lesslinux/scancl-blob ;; esac
